Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw crossed her arms at Hell Beast. "Just show me his position. As 
inexperienced as your troops look, they may give me away. I rather work 
alone. I'm not good working with others. I've hunted before, and I've been 
hunted. I know what I'm doing. And it won't be a loss." She bowed her head, 
turning it to her wound on her side, caused by Mosquitor. She may have to go 
to the CR tank again.

She sometimes thought, what's the use? And she had even agreed to her 
thoughts, trying to kill herself. It didn't work. In her past, Megatron 
would never kill her.

Why even bother with Megatron? She could live free in the Wild like she had 
before. She wasn't yet sure if he was still hunting her. But she still 
couldn't escape the memories.
